Arg: %1$s Settings Instructions News Detect Spy Instructions Settings Warning to accept permission NiDar - SATARK * SAVADHAN * SURAKSHIT Hidden\nCamera Share and Save Lives Emergency\nSOS NiDar needs access to Sending SMS:- Emergency messaging needs SEND SMS permission Location:- Messaging embedded with live location needs Location permission Phone Call:- Emergency Calling needs CALL PHONE permission Declaration The app is solely developed by INDIAN Developers and all data related to this app is stored locally in your phone. Women\'s\nNews TODO About\nUs App\nTour" Siren\nAlert PRIVACY POLICY Choose Language Installation of Hidden cameras at various public places used by women has been one of the greatest havoc problems of women\'s self respect and dignity. So, This feature of NiDar helps women to detect hidden cameras anywhere.\n\nTypes of Hidden cameras :-\n\n1. Hidden cameras which emit IR rays :-\n\nYour phone\'s camera with night vision can detect the blinking of these rays same as we test the remote control of TV . \n\n2. Advanced Electronic Hidden cameras :-\n\nThese cameras do not emit IR rays but as these are electronic cameras so they radiate Electromagnetic radiations.\n\nAnd we have developed a simulation by the help of the magnetometer sensor of your phone which helps you detect any electronic device. \nBut as the hidden cameras are installed mostly at those places where use of electronic devices is not needed. \nSo, detecting any electronic device at those places ensures the chances of spy camera installation. \nYou have to just move and scan all the suspected places by your phone and if there is any hidden camera then NiDar will start beeping. Make sure that the phone is very much close to the suspected area.\n\n Detailed instructions We are the NiDar team who has developed this application for the safety of women. It helps in addressing the most devastating problem of human civilization till date, by an innovating technology and simulation. \n Thank-you!! Possibility of a Hidden Camera in bedroom is almost 15%. \n\nScan for devices listed below: \n\n1. Smoke Detector - \nPrecaution: Apply sticker/tape over the viewable part of the detector. \n\n2. Air Conditioner - \nPrecaution: Use fan and turn off the AC if possible. Turn rotating blades off. \n\n3. Television - \nPrecaution: Turn off main supply, keep objects in front of lens looking part of the TV. \n\n4. Night Lamp - \nPrecaution: Keep it off or change it\'s position. \n\n 5.Flower Pot - \nPrecaution: Change position to least viewable area. \n\n6. Coffee Maker - \nPrecaution: Unplug it and put it inside cupboard. \n\n Finally Do NOT forget to turn off the lights. Possibility of a Hidden Camera in changing room is almost 20%. \n\nScan for devices listed below: \n\n1. Mirror - \nPrecaution: Touch the mirror. Do you feel any gap between your finger and its reflection? if NO, there could be a hidden camera behind the mirror glass. Report Immediately or change the room. \n\n2. Hanger - \nPrecaution: Check for lens looking aperture for hanger specially screw looking objects. Put cloths covering all screws. \n\n3. Ceiling/Smoke Detector - \nPrecaution: Apply sticker/tape over the viewable part of the detector. Detect High Tech Spy Cameras Tips for manual detection Detect hidden Cameras anywhere Setup Emergency SOS service and get help at unsafe places Read Women\'s empowerment and struggle news and get empowered Use this button to deviate the culprit, this can also be triggered by just tapping the power button 6 times While Outside you might be under CCTV camera. \n\nIn Outside world, you are not supposed to hide your identity in official places. so just be cautious and behave accordingly. Enter first phone number… Enter second phone number… Enter third phone number… Enter fourth phone number… Enter message… Try it Save INSTRUCTIONS for Emergency Service Step 1:- Save maximum four contact numbers of your relatives.\n\nStep 2:- Tap TRY IT button to test the functionality of the SOS.\n\nStep 3:- The app will send SMS with your live location to all four numbers and make phone call to first number. The live location will not be a link, instead it will be longitude, latitude and the exact place wherever you are present, so that your relatives could take action even if they don\'t have internet connection.\n\nStep 4:- Now, Ladybuddy is ready to help you in emergency situations.\n\nLet\'s see how you will use ladybuddy in emergency:-\n\nStep 1:- Whenever you go through any unsafe place, just open the app and press back or home button so that the app starts running in the background.\n\nStep 2:- Make Sure that app is running in the background that means it is in the system tray.\n\nStep 3:- Whenever you feel emergency, tapping power button three times will send Emergency message and call, tapping it again three times will start a siren to deviate the culprit.\n\nStep 4:- Make Sure that all these 6 times tapping should be in one minute otherwise you will have to again start tapping count from zero.\n\nStep 5:- Tapping power button again three times or closing the app from background will stop the siren.\n\nNote:- Make sure that tapping power button means screen goes off or on Short Instructions \nStep 1:- Save relative\'s phone no.s\n\nStep 2:- Test the SOS Functionality\n\nStep 3:- Run the app in background whenever you feel unsafe\n\nStep 4:- Tap the power button 3 times Make sure for Emergency messaging and calling\n\nStep 5:- Tap power button 3 times more to start the siren alarm and 3 times more to stop it\n\n Note:- Make sure that tapping power button means screen goes off or on\n\nRead detailed instructions on the top right corner\n Okay हिंदी Possibility of a Hidden Camera in bathroom is almost 12%. \n\nScan for devices listed below: \n\n1. Water Heater - \nPrecaution: Turn it off before taking bath. \n\n2. Mirror - \nPrecaution: Touch the mirror. Do you feel any gap between your finger and its reflection? if NO, there could be a hidden camera behind the mirror glass. \n\n3. Ceiling/Smoke Detector - \nPrecaution: Apply sticker/tape over the viewable part of the detector. \n\n4. Lamps or Bulbs - \nPrecaution: You cannot do much about that, but still use curtains whenever possible. Hidden cameras which emit IR rays can simply be detected by using night vision of your phone camera.But these days very high tech hidden cameras are present in the market which do not even emit IR rays, so our magnetometer sensor simulation helps you detect those spy cameras very easily..
